def upper_bound(arr, v)
  l = -1
  r = arr.size
  while l + 1 < r
    m = (l + r) / 2
    if arr[m] <= v then l = m
    else r = m
    end
  end
  r
end
 
EPS = 1e-9

n, m, l = gets.split.map(&:to_i)
p, t, v = n.times.map{ gets.split.map(&:to_f) }.transpose
time_set = n.times.map{ [0] * (m + 1) }
prob_set = n.times.map{ [0] * (m + 1) }

factorial = (1..m).each_with_object([1]) { |i, arr| arr << arr[-1] * i }
n.times do |i|
  s = l / v[i]
  (m + 1).times do |j|
    time_set[i][j] = s + t[i] * j
    prob_set[i][j] = (p[i] / 100.0) ** j * (1 - p[i] / 100.0) ** (m - j) * factorial[m] / factorial[m - j] / factorial[j]
  end
end
prob_sum = prob_set.map{ |ps| (0..m).map{ |i| ps[i..-1].reduce(:+) } }
n.times do |i|
  ret = 0
  (m + 1).times do |j|
    prob = prob_set[i][j]
    n.times do |k|
      next if i == k
      idx = upper_bound(time_set[k], time_set[i][j] + EPS)
      if idx == m + 1
        prob = 0
        break
      end
      prob *= prob_sum[k][idx]
    end
    ret += prob
  end
  puts '%.8f' % ret
end

EPS = 1e-9
n, m, l = gets.split.map(&:to_i)
p, t, v = n.times.map{ gets.split.map(&:to_f) }.transpose

prob_set = n.times.map{ [0] * (m + 1) }

factorial = (1..m).each_with_object([1]) { |i, arr| arr << arr[-1] * i }
n.times do |i|
  (m + 1).times do |j|
    prob_set[i][j] = (p[i] / 100.0) ** j * (1 - p[i] / 100.0) ** (m - j) * factorial[m] / factorial[m - j] / factorial[j]
  end
end
prob_sum = prob_set.map{ |ps| (0..m).map{ |i| ps[i..-1].reduce(:+) } }

n.times do |i|
  ret = 0
  (m + 1).times do |j|
    prob = prob_set[i][j]
    time = l / v[i] + t[i] * j
    n.times do |k|
      next if i == k
      base = l / v[k]
      upper = (time - base) / t[k] + EPS
      if upper >= m
        prob = 0
        break
      end
      upper = upper < 0 ? 0 : upper.ceil
      prob *= prob_sum[k][upper]
    end
    ret += prob
  end
  puts '%.8f' % ret
end

class Array
	def accum
		inject([0]){|a, x| a + [a[-1] + x]}
	end

	def accum!
		(1..size-1).each{|i|
			self[i] += self[i-1]
		}
		self.unshift(0)
	end

	def accum_2d
		ac = map{|r| r.accum}
		(1..size-1).each{|i|
			(1..ac[0].size-1).each{|j|
				ac[i][j] += ac[i-1][j]
			}
		}
		ac.unshift([0] * ac[0].size)
		ac
	end

	def accum_2d!
		each{|r| r.accum!}
		(1..size-1).each{|i|
			(1..self[0].size-1).each{|j|
				self[i][j] += self[i-1][j]
			}
		}
		unshift([0] * self[0].size)
	end
		
	def bsearch_first_index(l = 0, r = size - 1, &pred)
		return nil if l > r
		c = (l + r) / 2 
		if pred[self[c]]
			bsearch_first_index(l, c-1, &pred) || c
		else
			bsearch_first_index(c+1, r, &pred)
		end
	end

	def bsearch_first_item(l = 0, r = size - 1, &pred)
		i = bsearch_first_index(l, r, &pred)
		i ? self[i] : nil
	end

	def bsearch_last_index(l = 0, r = size - 1, &pred)
		return nil if l > r
		c = (l + r) / 2 
		if pred[self[c]]
			bsearch_last_index(c+1, r, &pred) || c
		else
			bsearch_last_index(l, c-1, &pred)
		end
	end

	def bsearch_last_item(l = 0, r = size - 1, &pred)
		i = bsearch_last_index(l, r, &pred)
		i ? self[i] : nil
	end
end

n, m, l = gets.split.map &:to_i

def comb(n, k)
	c = 1	
	(1..k).each do |i|
		c = c * (n - i + 1) / i
	end
	c
end

a = []
(0..n-1).each do |i|
	a[i] = []
	p, r, v = gets.split.map &:to_i		
	p /= 100.0
	a[i] = (0..m).map do |k|
		prob = p ** k * (1 - p) ** (m - k) * comb(m, k)
		[(v == 0 ? Float::INFINITY : l.to_f / v + r * k), prob]
	end
	
	tmp = a[i].map(&:last).reverse.accum[1..-1].reverse
	(0..m).each {|k| a[i][k] << tmp[k] }
end

(0..n-1).each do |i|
	total_prob = 0
	(0..m).map do |k|
		time, prob = a[i][k]
		(0..n-1).each do |j|
			next if j == i
			dist = a[j]
			item = dist.bsearch_first_item {|t, _, _| t > time}	
			prob *= (item ? item[-1] : 0)
		end
		total_prob += prob
	end
	p total_prob
end

def upper_bound(arr, v)
  l = -1
  r = arr.size
  while l + 1 < r
    m = (l + r) / 2
    if arr[m] <= v then l = m
    else r = m
    end
  end
  r
end
 
EPS = 1e-9

n, m, l = gets.split.map(&:to_i)
p, t, v = n.times.map{ gets.split.map(&:to_f) }.transpose
time_set = n.times.map{ [] }
prob_set = n.times.map{ [] }

factorial = (1..m).each_with_object([1]) { |i, arr| arr << arr[-1] * i }
n.times do |i|
  s = l / v[i]
  (m + 1).times do |j|
    time_set[i] << s + t[i] * j
    prob_set[i] << (p[i] / 100.0) ** j * (1 - p[i] / 100.0) ** (m - j) * factorial[m] / factorial[m - j] / factorial[j]
  end
end
prob_sum = prob_set.map{ |ps| (0..m).map{ |i| ps[i..-1].reduce(:+) } }

n.times do |i|
  ret = 0
  (m + 1).times do |j|
    prob = prob_set[i][j]
    n.times do |k|
      next if i == k
      idx = upper_bound(time_set[k], time_set[i][j] + EPS)
      if idx == m + 1
        prob = 0
        break
      end
      prob *= prob_sum[k][idx]
    end
    ret += prob
  end
  puts '%.8f' % ret
end

class Array
	def accum
		inject([0]){|a, x| a + [a[-1] + x]}
	end

	def accum!
		(1..size-1).each{|i|
			self[i] += self[i-1]
		}
		self.unshift(0)
	end

	def accum_2d
		ac = map{|r| r.accum}
		(1..size-1).each{|i|
			(1..ac[0].size-1).each{|j|
				ac[i][j] += ac[i-1][j]
			}
		}
		ac.unshift([0] * ac[0].size)
		ac
	end

	def accum_2d!
		each{|r| r.accum!}
		(1..size-1).each{|i|
			(1..self[0].size-1).each{|j|
				self[i][j] += self[i-1][j]
			}
		}
		unshift([0] * self[0].size)
	end
		
	def bsearch_first_index(l = 0, r = size - 1, &pred)
		return nil if l > r
		c = (l + r) / 2 
		if pred[self[c]]
			bsearch_first_index(l, c-1, &pred) || c
		else
			bsearch_first_index(c+1, r, &pred)
		end
	end

	def bsearch_first_item(l = 0, r = size - 1, &pred)
		i = bsearch_first_index(l, r, &pred)
		i ? self[i] : nil
	end

	def bsearch_last_index(l = 0, r = size - 1, &pred)
		return nil if l > r
		c = (l + r) / 2 
		if pred[self[c]]
			bsearch_last_index(c+1, r, &pred) || c
		else
			bsearch_last_index(l, c-1, &pred)
		end
	end

	def bsearch_last_item(l = 0, r = size - 1, &pred)
		i = bsearch_last_index(l, r, &pred)
		i ? self[i] : nil
	end
end

n, m, l = gets.split.map &:to_i

def comb(n, k)
	c = 1	
	(1..k).each do |i|
		c = c * (n - i + 1) / i
	end
	c
end

a = []
(0..n-1).each do |i|
	a[i] = []
	p, r, v = gets.split.map &:to_i		
	p /= 100.0
	a[i] = (0..m).map do |k|
		prob = p ** k * (1 - p) ** (m - k) * comb(m, k)
		[(v == 0 ? Float::INFINITY : l.to_f / v + r * k), prob]
	end
	
	tmp = a[i].map(&:last).reverse.accum[1..-1].reverse
	(0..m).each {|k| a[i][k] << tmp[k] }
end

(0..n-1).each do |i|
	total_prob = 0
	(0..m).map do |k|
		time, prob = a[i][k]
		(0..n-1).each do |j|
			next if j == i
			dist = a[j]
			item = dist.bsearch_first_item {|t, _, _| t > time}	
			prob *= (item ? item[-1] : 0)
		end
		total_prob += prob
	end
    puts "%.08f" % total_prob
end

def upper_bound(arr, v)
  l = -1
  r = arr.size
  while l + 1 < r
    m = (l + r) / 2
    if arr[m] <= v then l = m
    else r = m
    end
  end
  r
end
 
EPS = 1e-9

n, m, l = gets.split.map(&:to_i)
p, t, v = n.times.map{ gets.split.map(&:to_f) }.transpose
time_set = n.times.map{ [0] * (m + 1) }
prob_set = n.times.map{ [0] * (m + 1) }
prob_sum = n.times.map{ [0] * (m + 1) }

factorial = (1..m).each_with_object([1]) { |i, arr| arr << arr[-1] * i }
n.times do |i|
  s = l / v[i]
  (m + 1).times do |j|
    time_set[i][j] = s + t[i] * j
    prob_set[i][j] = (p[i] / 100.0) ** j * (1 - p[i] / 100.0) ** (m - j) * factorial[m] / factorial[m - j] / factorial[j]
    prob_sum[i][j+1] = prob_sum[i][j] + prob_set[i][j]
  end
end

n.times do |i|
  ret = 0
  (m + 1).times do |j|
    prob = prob_set[i][j]
    n.times do |k|
      next if i == k
      idx = upper_bound(time_set[k], time_set[i][j] + EPS)
      if idx == m + 1
        prob = 0
        break
      end
      prob *= 1 - prob_sum[k][idx]
    end
    ret += prob
  end
  puts '%.8f' % ret
end

def upper_bound(arr, v)
  l = -1
  r = arr.size
  while l + 1 < r
    m = (l + r) / 2
    if arr[m] <= v then l = m
    else r = m
    end
  end
  r
end

n.times do |i|

EPS = 1e-9
n, m, l = gets.split.map(&:to_i)
p, t, v = n.times.map{ gets.split.map(&:to_f) }.transpose

prob_set = n.times.map{ [0] * (m + 1) }

factorial = (1..m).each_with_object([1]) { |i, arr| arr << arr[-1] * i }
n.times do |i|
  (m + 1).times do |j|
    prob_set[i][j] = (p[i] / 100.0) ** j * (1 - p[i] / 100.0) ** (m - j) * factorial[m] / factorial[m - j] / factorial[j]
  end
end
prob_sum = prob_set.map{ |ps| (0..m).map{ |i| ps[i..-1].reduce(:+) } }

n.times do |i|
  ret = 0
  (m + 1).times do |j|
    prob = prob_set[i][j]
    time = l / v[i] + t[i] * j
    n.times do |k|
      next if i == k
      base = l / v[k]
      upper = (time - base) / t[k] + EPS
      if upper >= m || time - base == 0 && t[k] == 0
        prob = 0
        break
      end
      upper = upper < 0 ? 0 : upper.ceil
      prob *= prob_sum[k][upper]
    end
    ret += prob
  end
  puts '%.8f' % ret
end

class Integer
  def combination(k)
    self.factorial/(k.factorial*(self-k).factorial)
  end

  def factorial
    return 1 if self == 0
    (1..self).inject(:*)
  end
end

def upper_bound(arr, v)
  l = -1
  r = arr.size
  while l + 1 < r
    m = (l + r) / 2
    if arr[m] <= v then l = m
    else r = m
    end
  end
  r
end

EPS = 1e-9
n, m, l = gets.split.map(&:to_i)
p, t, v = n.times.map{ gets.split.map(&:to_i) }.transpose

time_set = n.times.map{ [0] * (m + 1) }
prob_set = n.times.map{ [0] * (m + 1) }
n.times do |i|
  s = v[i] == 0 ? Float::INFINITY : l / v[i].to_f
  (m + 1).times do |j|
    time_set[i][j] = s + t[i] * j
    prob_set[i][j] = ((p[i] / 100.0) ** j) * ((1 - p[i] / 100.0) ** (m - j)) * m.combination(j)
  end
end

prob_sum = prob_set.map{ |ps| ps.reverse.each_with_object([0]){ |p, arr| arr << arr[-1] + p }[1..-1].reverse }

n.times do |i|
  ret = 0
  (m + 1).times do |j|
    prob = prob_set[i][j]
    n.times do |k|
      next if i == k
      idx = upper_bound(time_set[k], time_set[i][j] + EPS)
      if idx == m + 1
        prob = 0
        break
      end
      prob *= prob_sum[k][idx]
    end
    ret += prob
  end
  puts '%.8f' % ret
end

def upper_bound(arr, v)
  l = -1
  r = arr.size
  while l + 1 < r
    m = (l + r) / 2
    if arr[m] <= v then l = m
    else r = m
    end
  end
  r
end

EPS = 1e-9
n, m, l = gets.split.map(&:to_i)
p, t, v = n.times.map{ gets.split.map(&:to_i) }.transpose
@combination = (0..m).map{ [0] * (m + 1) }
(0..m).each{ |i| @combination[i][0] = @combination[i][i] = 1 }
(2..m).each do |i|
  (1..m).each do |j|
    @combination[i][j] = @combination[i-1][j] + @combination[i-1][j-1]
  end
end

time_set = n.times.map{ [0] * (m + 1) }
prob_set = n.times.map{ [0] * (m + 1) }
n.times do |i|
  s = v[i] == 0 ? Float::INFINITY : l / v[i].to_f
  (m + 1).times do |j|
    time_set[i][j] = s + t[i] * j
    prob_set[i][j] = (p[i] / 100.0) ** j * (1 - p[i] / 100.0) ** (m - j) * @combination[m][j]
  end
end

prob_sum = prob_set.map{ |ps| ps.reverse.each_with_object([0]){ |p, arr| arr << arr[-1] + p }[1..-1].reverse }

n.times do |i|
  ret = 0
  (m + 1).times do |j|
    prob = prob_set[i][j]
    n.times do |k|
      next if i == k
      idx = upper_bound(time_set[k], time_set[i][j] + EPS)
      if idx == m + 1
        prob = 0
        break
      end
      prob *= prob_sum[k][idx]
    end
    ret += prob
  end
  puts '%.8f' % ret
end

  end
end
prob_sum = prob_set.map{ |ps| (0..m).map{ |i| ps[i..-1].reduce(:+) } }
 
n.times do |i|
  ret = 0
  (m + 1).times do |j|
    prob = prob_set[i][j]
    n.times do |k|
      next if i == k
      idx = upper_bound(time_set[k], time_set[i][j] + EPS)
      if idx == m + 1
        prob = 0
        break
      end
      prob *= prob_sum[k][idx]
    end
    ret += prob
  end
  puts '%.8f' % ret
end

EPS = 1e-9
INF = Float::INFINITY
n, m, l = gets.split.map(&:to_i)
p, t, v = n.times.map{ gets.split.map(&:to_f) }.transpose
v.map!{ |e| l / e }
prob_set = n.times.map{ [0] * (m + 1) }

factorial = (1..m).each_with_object([1]) { |i, arr| arr << arr[-1] * i }
n.times do |i|
  (m + 1).times do |j|
    prob_set[i][j] = (p[i] / 100.0) ** j * (1 - p[i] / 100.0) ** (m - j) * factorial[m] / factorial[m - j] / factorial[j]
  end
end
prob_sum = prob_set.map{ |ps| (0..m).map{ |i| ps[i..-1].reduce(:+) } }

n.times do |i|
  ret = 0
  (m + 1).times do |j|
    prob = prob_set[i][j]
    time = v[i] + t[i] * j
    n.times do |k|
      next if i == k
      upper = (time - v[k]) / t[k] + EPS
      if upper >= m || time - v[k] == 0 && t[k] == 0 || v[i] == INF && v[k] == INF
        prob = 0
        break
      end
      upper = upper < 0 ? 0 : upper.ceil
      prob *= prob_sum[k][upper]
    end
    ret += prob
  end
  puts '%.8f' % ret
end

def upper_bound(arr, v)
  l = -1
  r = arr.size
  while l + 1 < r
    m = (l + r) / 2
    if arr[m] <= v then l = m
    else r = m
    end
  end
  r
end

EPS = 1e-9
Factorial = (1..50).each_with_object([1]) { |i, arr| arr << arr[-1] * i }

n, m, l = gets.split.map(&:to_i)
p, t, v = n.times.map{ gets.split.map(&:to_i) }.transpose
time_set = n.times.map{ [0] * (m + 1) }
prob_set = n.times.map{ [0] * (m + 1) }
n.times do |i|
  s = v[i] == 0 ? Float::INFINITY : l / v[i].to_f
  (m + 1).times do |j|
    time_set[i][j] = s + t[i] * j
    prob_set[i][j] = (p[i] / 100.0) ** j * (1 - p[i] / 100.0) ** (m - j) * Factorial[m] / Factorial[m - j] / Factorial[j]
  end
end

n.times do |i|
  ret = 0
  (m + 1).times do |j|
    prob = prob_set[i][j]
    n.times do |k|
      next if i == k
      idx = upper_bound(time_set[k], time_set[i][j] + EPS)
      if idx == m + 1
        prob = 0
        break
      end
      prob *= prob_set[k][idx..-1].reduce(:+)
    end
    ret += prob
  end
  puts '%.8f' % ret
end

def upper_bound(arr, v)
  l = -1
  r = arr.size
  while l + 1 < r
    m = (l + r) / 2
    if arr[m] <= v then l = m
    else r = m
    end
  end
  r
end
